creditline: Gift of Mr. Harold S. Gladwin
description: olla, black on terra cotta, with a design of rayed fish heads with bodies circling the jar in a bold scroll pattern; narrow lines of red at neck and base, together with red squares in the fish rays, put this in Ramos polychrome group; the rim has double piercing for carrying cords; 'Casas Grandes' type, Tardio phase
title: Jar (Olla)
